attributes.additional_details: This is for my Granddad how in WW1 was at GOLIPOLY jest like a lot of british peoples Grandfathers. With the centinery of The Great war this year I would like the government to award the familys of all the brave men a MEDEL as the Austrailans and the New Zealanders were awared. The one hundred year of this invasion is next year in 2015. It is time to give these brave men the medel  they never had.
